Detailed Description

ConfigASE.h contains defines that configures how ASE is compiled. All memory allocation is at compile time, therefore you must here specify how many instances of different classes must be allocated. E.g. how many Gradients are will the application use?

Author:
David Johan Christensen, Modular Robotics Lab, University of Southern Denmark
Note:
This software is distributed under the BSD open-source license.
